examples: The car was completely crushed under the truck.
El coche quedó completamente aplastado debajo del camión.
Several people were crushed to death in the accident.
Varias personas murieron aplastadas en el accidente.
Add two cloves of crushed garlic.
Agrega dos dientes de ajo machacados.
They crush the olives with a heavy wooden press.
Trituran las aceitunas con una prensa de madera pesada.
